welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yonkers, a charming city known for its historic landmarks, beautiful parks, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Pondfield Cafe
restaurants.description: Pondfield Cafe is a café located in Yonkers.
restaurants.address: 3 Pondfield Rd W (at Gard Ave.), Yonkers, NY 10708

restaurants.description: Louie & Johnnie's Ristorante Primavera is a italian restaurant located in Yonkers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'HPN Free WiFi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Delta Airlines domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Major international hub for multiple airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International flights for British Airways, Iberia, and others

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: American Airlines domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
